# COVID-19 Research Paper Search Engine - Frontend

## Project Overview
A clean, modern React frontend for searching COVID-19 research papers. Built with Vite and plain CSS.

## Tech Stack
- React 18 with Vite
- Plain CSS (no frameworks)
- Simple component architecture

## Project Structure
- `src/components/` - React components (SearchBar, ResultsList, ResultCard)
- `src/App.jsx` - Main application component
- `src/index.css` - Global styles
- `src/App.css` - Component styles

## Design Principles
- KISS (Keep It Simple, Stupid)
- Neutral color palette (grays, whites)
- Clean, functional UI
- Easy to explain and understand

## Running the Project
```bash
npm install
npm run dev
```
